definition: an act that sets in motion some course of events
details:
noun
- an act that sets in motion some course of events
= synonyms: trigger
- the act of starting something for the first time
= synonyms: founding, foundation, institution, origination, creation, innovation, instauration, introduction
- wisdom as evidenced by the possession of knowledge
= synonyms: knowledgeability, knowledgeableness
- a formal entry into an organization or position or office
= example: a formal entry into an organization or position or office
= synonyms: induction
